meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7097.

td.p: Matt Pressman, a graduate student in history from Somerville, Massachusetts
Donna Normington, an office manager from Mesa, Arizona
Sacha Samotin, a student from Naples, Florida (whose 1-day cash winnings total $19,600)

tr.td: NEW YORK POLITICIANS
DISCOGRAPHIES
6-LETTER WORDS
TOOLS
LITERARY CHARACTERS
SPOT THE IM‑PASTA
(Alex: We want you to [*]: the one item in the clue that is not a pasta.)

HISTORICAL FILMS
